articles.title: Spidercam operator stood down after Nortje incident - The Age
articles.description: The operator who accidentally piloted Fox Cricket’s Spidercam into an ugly collision with South Africa’s spearhead Anrich Nortje has been stood down from the remainder of the Boxing Day Test.
articles.content: Play was held up briefly when players noticed Nortje on the ground. Steve Smith, who once complained at the SCG when an attempt to take a catch was spoiled by Spidercams wires, described the circumst… [+1070 chars]

articles.title: A 15-metric ton meteorite crashed in Africa. Now 2 new minerals have been found in it - Oz Arab Media
articles.description: Scientists have identified two minerals never before seen on Earth in a meteorite weighing 15.2 metric tons (33,510 pounds). The minerals came from a 70-gram (nearly 2.5-ounce) slice of the meteorite, which was discovered in Somalia in 2020 and is the…
articles.content:
Scientists have identified two minerals never before seen on Earth in a meteorite weighing 15.2 metric tons (33,510 pounds).
